meanings.definition: Stimulating the production of luteinizing hormone.
meanings.sent1: The luteinizing hormone test measures the amount of luteinizing hormone in the blood.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the luteinizing hormone surge triggers ovulation.
meanings.sent3: The luteinizing hormone party in my body is always busy!
meanings.sent4: Her words had a luteinizing effect on his motivation, making him work harder.
meanings.sent5: The luteinizing hormone danced through her veins, signaling the start of a new cycle.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the process of luteinizing.
meanings.sent1: The luteinizing process is crucial for reproductive health.
meanings.sent2: She studied the luteinizing phase of the menstrual cycle in biology class.
meanings.sent3: The luteinizing rhythm of nature never fails to fascinate me.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a luteinizing maze of thoughts, all leading to the same conclusion.
meanings.sent5: The luteinizing journey of the egg was carefully monitored by the doctor.

meanings.sent1: The luteinizing action of the hormone is essential for fertility.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the luteinizing process in simple terms.
meanings.sent3: The luteinizing adventure of the hormone was like a rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a luteinizing effect on everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The luteinizing journey of the hormone through the body was like a well-choreographed dance.
